# mgc_container_registry_proxy_cache (Resource)

Manages the proxy cache

## Example Usage

```terraform
resource "mgc_container_registry_proxy_cache" "example" {
  name          = "terraform-proxy-cache"
  description   = "description"
  provider_name = "docker-hub"
  url           = "https://hub.docker.com"
  access_key    = "access_key"
  access_secret = "access_secret"
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `name` (String) Unique name for each tenant, used for the proxy cache
- `provider_name` (String) Provider identifier
- `url` (String) Endpoint URL for the proxied registry

### Optional

- `access_key` (String, Sensitive) Provider access_id
- `access_secret` (String, Sensitive) Provider access_secret
- `description` (String) Description of the proxy cache

### Read-Only

- `created_at` (String) The timestamp when the proxy cache was created
- `id` (String) Unique identifier for the proxy cache
- `updated_at` (String) The timestamp when the proxy cache was last updated

## Import

Import is supported using the following syntax:

The [`terraform import` command](https://developer.hashicorp.com/terraform/cli/commands/import) can be used, for example:

```shell
terraform import mgc_container_registry_proxy_cache.my_proxy <proxy_id>
```
